doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 超出工单各环节时限情况统计表

sql.name: Tssg_form_sum
sql.item: select type.项目1 as 项目, type.项目2 as 项目, type.项目3 as 项目, type.项目4 as 项目, type.具体 as 具体 from (select distinct buss.c801800001 as 项目1,buss.c801800002 as 项目2 ,buss.c801800003 as 项目3, buss.c801800004 as 项目4, buss.c801800005 as 项目5,buss.c801800006 as 具体, buss.c801800007 from {100} buss where buss.c801800001='投诉' order by buss.c801800007 desc,buss.c801800001, buss.c801800006 ) type

sql.name: Tssg_form_sum_number
